text: $$\textrm{} Alarm_{F} = True \; , \; MSF_{sc} = \textrm{Available (NA)}$$ $$\textrm{Else } SD_F \leq SD_W \; , \; MSF_{sc} = MSF$$ $$\textrm{Else } \; , \; MSF_{sc} = MSF - \frac{SD_F - SD_{week}}{2}$$ : \(MSF_{sc}\) = Sleep-corrected local time mid-sleep work-free days. \(Alarm_{F}\) = logical value indicating respondent uses alarm clock wake work-free days. \(MSF\) = Local time mid-sleep work-free days. \(SD_W\) = Sleep duration workdays. \(SD_F\) = Sleep duration work-free days. \(SD_{week}\) = Average weekly sleep duration. * \(W\) = Workdays; \(F\) = Work-free days. Note , since: $$MSF = SO_{F} + \frac{SD_{F}}{2}$$ : \(MSF\) = Local time mid-sleep work-free days. \(SO_{F}\) = Local time sleep onset work-free days. \(SD_{F}\) = Sleep duration work-free days. last condition \(MSF_{sc}\) computation can simplified : $$MSF_{sc} = SO_{F} + \frac{SD_{F}}{2} - \frac{SD_{F} - SD_{week}}{2}$$ $$MSF_{sc} = SO_{F} + \frac{SD_{F}}{2} - \frac{SD_{F}}{2} + \frac{SD_{week}}{2}$$ $$MSF_{sc} = SO_{F} + \frac{SD_{week}}{2}$$
